mod.name: ImprovedAirlock
mod.description:
Gives Airlocks, Suit lockers, and Airlock Doors a boost in Oxygen ====================== Default Changes Include
Airlock: - Oxygen Capacity: 6,000 -> 10,000 - Outgoing Inventory: 10 -> 20 - Incoming Inventory: 10 -> 20
Suit Locker: - Oxygen Capacity: 6,000 -> 7,000
Airlock Doorway: - Oxygen Capacity: 1,000 -> 3,500
mod.author: Killparadise
